医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
类风湿关节炎的炎症活动影响认知功能发表在开放获取期刊 RMD Open 上的一项小型比较研究发现，类风湿性关节炎引起的体内炎症活动与特定的认知障碍有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Inflammatory-activity-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-impacts-cognitive-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Inflammatory-activity-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-impacts-cognitive-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e90de316-d2b6-4eec-aa5c-c09077211346 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:24:07 -0400 Inflammatory activity in rheumatoid arthritis impacts cognitive function
运甲状腺素蛋白水平与心力衰竭和死亡率相关阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校 Marnix E. Heersink 医学院的医生科学家发现了关于转甲状腺素蛋白（TTR）蛋白质水平对心脏病风险影响的重要发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Transthyretin- Protein-levels-linked-to-heart-failure-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Transthyretin- Protein-levels-linked-to-heart-failure-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43cae6e6-fad9-489b-9af0-d778f82b1e02 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:19:24 -0400 Transthyretin protein levels linked to heart failure and mortality
尽管疼痛，体力活动和积极影响仍可提高患有纤维肌痛的女性的认知能力研究人员发现，即使疼痛严重程度很高，体力活动和积极情绪也可以改善患有纤维肌痛的女性的认知能力。促进两者的结合可以减轻慢性疼痛对认知的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Physical-activity-and-positive-affect-boost-cognition-in-women-with-太多纤维肌痛-despite-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Physical-activity-and-positive-affect-boost-cognition-in-women-with-太多纤维肌痛-despite-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ff83cc9-d36a-4c98-b366-817c8e81cccc Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:18:00 -0400 Physical activity and positive affect boost cognition in women with fibromyalgia despite pain
新的评分系统增强了 HFpEF 患者的识别哈灵顿大学医院心脏与血管研究所的一位心力衰竭心脏病专家与人共同撰写的一项新研究证明了新开发的评分系统在识别射血分数保留 (HFpEF) 心力衰竭患者方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-scoring-system-enhances-identification-of-HFpEF-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-scoring-system-enhances-identification-of-HFpEF-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4d012d4-ba69-4e7b-b1ef-794b9310dc73 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:12:47 -0400 New scoring system enhances identification of HFpEF patients
体力活动可抵消糖尿病患者久坐的死亡风险哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究表明，符合建议的身体活动指南的糖尿病成人可能会抵消因久坐时间过长而导致的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Physical-activity-offsets-sedentary-mortality-risks-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Physical-activity-offsets-sedentary-mortality-risks-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=404c1d46-5363-4e1e-9088-766eceee9c74 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:07:00 -0400 Physical activity offsets sedentary mortality risks in diabetes patients
解读 miRNA 介导的肝再生调节：新见解肝脏是参与胆汁产生、血浆蛋白合成、营养吸收、解毒、维生素储存、宏量营养素代谢和免疫支持等许多重要生理过程的重要器官，具有显着的再生能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Deciphering-miRNA-mediad-regulation-of-liver-regenesis-New-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Deciphering-miRNA-mediad-regulation-of-liver-regenesis-New-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3197c941-a73a-41cd-96ac-b1ab6eb83244 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 21:57:27 -0400 Deciphering miRNA-mediated regulation of liver regeneration: New insights
母亲对流感的免疫反应与胎儿大脑的变化有关怀孕期间感染严重流感会增加胎儿神经发育障碍的风险，例如精神分裂症和自闭症谱系障碍。但造成损害的并不是病毒本身，而是病毒本身造成的。这是母亲的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Maternal-immune-response-to-flu-linked-to-fetal-brain-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Maternal-immune-response-to-flu-linked-to-fetal-brain-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9679ff5c-1233-4a7f-a753-ff9a87fe4cba Mon, 29 Jul 2024 21:50:50 -0400 Maternal immune response to flu linked to fetal brain changes
新型双激酶抑制剂 MTX-531 有望克服癌症治疗耐药性密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的一组研究人员设计了一种分子，可以削弱癌症治疗抵抗的两个关键驱动因素介导的信号传导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-dual-kinase-inhibitor-MTX-531-shows-promise-in-overcoming-cancer-therapy-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-dual-kinase-inhibitor-MTX-531-shows-promise-in-overcoming-cancer-therapy-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=003edd26-1f0e-44b2-91e3-7ef6c340a3f9 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 21:37:06 -0400 New dual kinase inhibitor MTX-531 shows promise in overcoming cancer therapy resistance
新的血液测试在诊断阿尔茨海默病方面的准确率达到 90%，优于医生瑞典研究人员开发出一种组合血液测试，诊断阿尔茨海默病的准确率高达 90%，超过了初级保健医生和专家的诊断率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-blood-test-achieves-9025-accuracy-in-diagnosing-Alzheimere28099s-disease-outperforms-doctors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/New-blood-test-achieves-9025-accuracy-in-diagnosing-Alzheimere28099s-disease-outperforms-doctors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=642e379e-63ba-4394-8e32-5b8468f2d6ef Mon, 29 Jul 2024 21:29:00 -0400 New blood test achieves 90% accuracy in diagnosing Alzheimer’s disease, outperforms doctors
FDA批准的铁螯合药物可以提供一种攻击卵巢肿瘤的新方法威尔康奈尔医学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，一种已被批准用于治疗其他疾病的铁结合药物可以提供一种攻击卵巢肿瘤的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/FDA-approved-iron-chelating-drug-could-provide-a-novel-way-to-attack-ovarian-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/FDA-approved-iron-chelating-drug-could-provide-a-novel-way-to-attack-ovarian-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fa28d56-7cab-460d-aa7e-e760c16a180f Mon, 29 Jul 2024 21:24:31 -0400 FDA-approved iron-chelating drug could provide a novel way to attack ovarian tumors
